C

COST_OF_COOKIE - Static variable in class EspressoStand
 
COST_OF_DOUBLE_SHORT - Static variable in class EspressoStand

COST_OF_SINGLE_SHORT - Static variable in class EspressoStand
 

E

EspressoStand - Class in <Unnamed>
The EspressoStand class maintains inventory and total sales records for an espresso stand and also processes orders and requests for reports.
EspressoStand() - Constructor for class EspressoStand
Constructs a new EspressoStand with 1000 shots, 8000 ounces of milk, 1000 cookies, 1000 cups, and 0 total sales.

G

getCookieCount() - Method in class Order
Get the quantity of cookies in the order.
getDoubleShortCount() - Method in class Order
Get the quantity of double short lattes in the order.
getDoubleTallCount() - Method in class Order
Get the quantity of double tall lattes in the order.
getInventory() - Method in class EspressoStand
Show how many shots, ounces of milk, cookies and cups remain in the inventory.
getSingleShortCount() - Method in class Order
Get the quantity of single short lattes in the order.
getTotalSales() - Method in class EspressoStand
Get the total sales.

O

Order - Class in <Unnamed>
The Order class contains the details of an order for an EspressoStand.
Order() - Constructor for class Order
The constructor with no parameter constructs a new order for a "Combo #1", which cosists of one single short latte and one cookie.
Order(int, int) - Constructor for class Order
The constructor with two parameters constructs a new order made up of combos.
Order(int, int, int, int) - Constructor for class Order
The constructor with four parameters constructs a new order made up of single short lattes, double short lattes, double tall lattes and cookies.

P

processOrder(Order) - Method in class EspressoStand
This method calculates the price of this order (the argument passed in cannot be null).

T

toString() - Method in class Order
The String version of the order.
